array.name: factlist
array.item: In accordance with U.S. laws, a beer commercial can never show a person actually drinking beer.
A toaster uses almost half as much energy as a full-sized oven.
Buttermilk does not contain any butter.
You cannot buy alcohol after 9pm in Connecticut.
El Salvador is the only Central American country without a coastline on the Caribbean.
Istanbul, Turkey is the only city in the world located on two continents.
William McKinley, 25th president of the U.S, died of gangrene after an assassination attempt. He was succeeded by VP Theodore Roosevelt.
As of the 2012-2013 season, Kobe Bryant is the highest paid NBA player with a salary of $30,453,805.
Greenville is the most popular name for a city/town in the US.
Vanilla is the most popular ice cream flavor followed by chocolate and pecan, respectively.
The first two android version names were Astro and Bender.
